column5: No. of colonies destroyed after diagnosis of AFB
column6: No. of colonies diagnosed positive for EFB †
column7: No. of colonies destroyed after diagnosis of EFB ‡
column8: No. of colonies treated with antibiotic after diagnosis of EFB ‡
column9: No. of colonies treated with shookswarm after diagnosis of EFB ‡
column10: No. of colonies sampled but laboratory diagnosis negative
column11: Percent of inspected colonies which had AFB
column12: Percent of inspected colonies which had EFB

column1: † - This figure may include colonies diagnosed but not yet treated.
‡ - This figure may include contact colonies which have a negative diagnosis but which are treated on request of the beekeeper.
